class menus.TopMenu(parent)¶

Bases: wx._core.MenuBar

TopMenu class derivated of wx.MenuBar which contains the Edit and File Menus

Parameters

wx.MenuBar (wx.MenuBar see https://wxpython.org/Phoenix/docs/html/wx.MenuBar.html) – Class to derivate
